exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable z.

In environment H : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : nat), network_step w this s1 s2 -> forall z : nat, z != this -> find z (dstate (getS s1 l)) = find z (dstate (getS s2 l)) W : world this : nid V : Type a : action V this l : nat s1, s2 : state r : V n : nat pf : a_safe a s1 Huneq : this != n Hstep : network_step W this s1 s2 Unable to unify "getLocal ?M1942 {| dstate := upd ?M1943 ?M1944 ?M1945; dsoup := ?M1946 |} = getLocal ?M1942 {| dstate := ?M1945; dsoup := ?M1946 |}" with "getLocal n (getS s1 l) = getLocal n (getS s2 l)".
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_step w this s1 s2 -> valid s2" on hypothesis of type "is_true (valid s1)".
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_step w this s1 s2 -> dom s1 =i dom s2" on hypothesis of type "is_true (valid s1)".

exceptions.tactic: apply step_preserves_node_ids with (l := l) in Hstep.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (l : Label), l \\in dom s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2 -> dom (dstate (getS s1 l)) =i dom (dstate (getS s2 l))" on hypothesis of type "is_true (valid s1)".
The LHS of Hstep (valid s1) does not match any subterm of the goal

apply Coh_dom with (w := W) in Hcoh2.

original: intros Huneq Hstep. apply step_sem in Hstep. apply step_is_local with (l := l) in Hstep. apply locU. auto. apply stepV1 in Hstep. apply stepV2 in Hstep. apply step_preserves_labels in Hstep. apply step_preserves_node_ids with (l := l) in Hstep. rewrite Hstep. apply step_coh in Hstep as [Hcoh1 Hcoh2]. apply Coh_dom with (w := W) in Hcoh1. apply Coh_dom with (w := W) in Hcoh2. auto. apply (a_safe_coh _ _ _ _ pf). apply stepV1. apply stepV2. apply step_preserves_labels. apply step_preserves_node_ids with (l := l). apply stepV1. apply stepV2. apply step_coh in Hstep as [_ Hcoh]. apply Coh_dom with (w := W) in Hcoh. apply step_preserves_labels in Hstep. rewrite Hstep. apply step_preserves_node_ids with (l := l). apply step_coh in Hstep as [Hcoh1 _]. apply Coh_dom with (w := W) in Hcoh1. auto.
